text: At Your Threshold () is a 1962 Soviet war drama movie directed by Vasili Ordynsky.У твоего порогаУ ТВОЕГО ПОРОГА It stars Nadezhda Fedosova, Pyotr Lyubeshkin, and Liliya Dzyuba. == Actors == * Nadezhda Fedosova as Mother * Pyotr Lyubeshkin as Father * Liliya Dzyuba as Liza (as Liliya Dsyuba) * Boris Yurchenko as Mikhail Prokhorenko * Yuri Gorobets as Perekalin == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian war movies Category:Russian drama movies Category:1962 war movies Category:1962 drama movies Category:World War II movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Soviet war movies Category:Movies directed by Vasili Ordynsky
title: At Your Threshold
